name: Tact-Tect
description:
Tact-Tect is a short tower defense game made for the Score Space Jam 17

Art made by LeaDieWalnuss: https://itch.io/profile/leadiewalnuss

Always feel free to comment and give your feedback! Don't forget to rate the game for the game jam! :)

The robot vacuum cleaners took over the world and you have to protect yourself from them.

IF DRAG AND DROPPING DOESN'T WORK FOR YOU, TRY TO DROP THE CARDS ON THE RIGHT SIDE OF THE MATCHING SLOTS

Tutorial
  • Press E to open your inventory.
  • Drag and drop cards in the right slot to make new towers.
  • Place towers on signs so they can shoot enemies.
  • Right-click on towers to destroy them
  • When you have enough gold, you can click on the chest to get new cards
  • Click on the book icon to see the stats of the tower components
  • Try to survive as long as possible without enemies getting in your base
Known Bugs and Tips
  • If drag and dropping doesn't work for you, try to drag and drop the cards on the right side of the matching slots.
